title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Mar 19 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Mar 19 2022
description:
Day 730 to stop the spread: Romney votes for masks. Clay and Buck are not surprised. Ukrainian President Zelensky makes emotional appeal to President Biden and Congress. Clay says there continues to be no doubt he is the modern-day Churchill and asks Buck if he's "crazy" to think that Zelensky's personal safety doesn't seem to be as much of an issue as was previously declared by the man who said the world might not ever see him alive again. Will the U.S. enforce a No-Fly Zone? Dr. Marty Makary joins C&B to discuss his latest Fox News piece: 10 Biggest Covid Mistakes -- Americans Deserve an Apology from the Medical Experts. Makary: "The American people, and children, in particular, deserve an apology." Kamala Harris weighs in on the mythical holiday, Equal Pay Day.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Day 730 to stop the spread: Romney votes for masks. Clay and Buck are not surprised. Ukrainian President Zelensky makes emotional appeal to President Biden and Congress. Clay says there continues to be no doubt he is the modern-day Churchill and asks Buck if he's "crazy" to think that Zelensky's personal safety doesn't seem to be as much of an issue as was previously declared by the man who said the world might not ever see him alive again. Will the U.S. enforce a No-Fly Zone? Dr. Marty Makary joins C&B to discuss his latest Fox News piece: 10 Biggest Covid Mistakes -- Americans Deserve an Apology from the Medical Experts. Makary: "The American people, and children, in particular, deserve an apology." Kamala Harris weighs in on the mythical holiday, Equal Pay Day.
